blocks.title: Verdict Named to ABA Journal's Best Legal Blogs
blocks.description: Verdict, Justia's legal analysis and commentary blog, has been named to ABA Journal's Best Legal Blogs of 2018 list. Citing Verdict columnists' in-depth exploration and analysis of current legal issues, ABA Journal lauded Verdict for the consistent quality of its daily articles that share both personal, scholarly insights and "go deeper into practice niches than the mainstream legal press."
